<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085979</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Bring history to life with a Living History Day!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Holen Sie Geschichte zum Leben mit einem lebenden 
Geschichte Tag!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Apportez l'histoire à la vie avec un jour vivant 
d'histoire !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Traga o history à vida com um dia vivo do 
history!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Porti la storia a vita con un giorno vivente di 
storia!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φέρτε την ιστορία στη ζωή με μια ημέρα ιστορίας 
διαβίωσης!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Traiga la historia a la vida con un día vivo de 
la historia!</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A Living History Day turns students into teachers and challenges them to think historically.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein lebender Geschichte Tag macht Kursteilnehmer zu Lehrer
und fordert sie heraus, historisch zu denken.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un jour vivant d'histoire transforme des étudiants en 
professeurs et les défie de penser historiquement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um dia vivo do history gira estudantes em professores e 
desafia-os pensar historicamente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un giorno vivente di storia trasforma negli allievi gli 
insegnanti e li sfida a pensare storicamente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ημέρα ιστορίας διαβίωσης μετατρέπει τους 
σπουδαστές σε δασκάλους και τους προκαλεί για να σκεφτεί 
ιστορικά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un día vivo de la historia da vuelta a estudiantes en 
profesores y los desafía a pensar históricamente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
